snippet: So Gong Dong Tofu’s small menu spins variations on three basic entrees: soondubu jjigae, a tofu stew; bibimbap, sautéed vegetables and meat over rice; and barbecue.
abstract: M H Reed reviews So Gong Dong Tofu restaurant in Hartsdale (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: So Gong Dong Tofu’s small menu spins variations on three basic entrees: soondubu jjigae, a tofu stew; bibimbap, sautéed vegetables and meat over rice; and barbecue.

headline.main: Korean Fast Food, as Spicy as You Like It
